DOC.brief_title: Format Patient Education Different Sociodemographic Groups
DOC.detailed_description: An anonymous questionnaire use collect basic demographic data patient condition interest , addition information preference format receive patient education information . This data statistically analyse address primary secondary outcome study : 1 . To investigate effect individual characteristic age , sex , ethnicity , educational level socioeconomic status preferred format patient education delivery . 2 . To identify reason preference patient education delivery , whether associate sociodemographic factor . 3 . To assess distribution sociodemographic factor participant prefer online education , order identify whether preference online education associate particular sociodemographic factor .
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 year . Diagnosed cardiovascular disease ( defined heart disease , peripheral vascular disease stroke ) Type 2 diabetes Has already complete questionnaire Able willing complete questionnaire Participant unable unwilling complete questionnaire Under age 18 Not diagnosed condition interest Participant already complete questionnaire Unable communicate ( assisted otherwise ) write English
